meanings.definition: Motoneurons: Nerve cells that transmit signals from the brain or spinal cord to muscles.
meanings.sent1: The motoneurons in the spinal cord help send messages to the muscles.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study how motoneurons communicate with muscles to understand movement.
meanings.sent3: The motoneurons had a race to see which one could reach the muscles first.
meanings.sent4: Like messengers, motoneurons swiftly deliver commands from the brain to muscles.
meanings.sent5: The motoneurons act as messengers, carrying urgent signals to the muscles.

meanings.definition: Motoneurons: Cells responsible for controlling muscle movement.
meanings.sent1: Muscle movement relies on the coordination of motoneurons.
meanings.sent2: Athletes train to strengthen their motoneurons for better control over muscles.
meanings.sent3: The motoneurons organized a dance party to show off their muscle-moving skills.
meanings.sent4: Motoneurons are like conductors orchestrating the symphony of muscle movements.
meanings.sent5: The motoneurons conduct the muscle orchestra, ensuring precise movements.
